review: I love this product. So far I have not really had time to play with all the features yet but it was super easy to set up and works fantastic.  It shipped really fast too.
author: Tina H "Electricgal"

review: I love my Fire TV Stick.  I travel out of town three weeks a month for three nights each week.  Since you can now login to the hotel wireless network with the Amazon Fire and Fire Stick, Iget to watch all my shows with almost no stuttering or video degradation.  Amazon Fire Stick is one of my favorite technology products.  Small, lightweight, inexpensive and exceeded my expectations.  Way to go Amazon!

review: It took a few minutes to learn how to navigate the menu and video/movie choices, but the boot up was painless.
